message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%
Let's be reasonable. I'll take 60%, you take 40%.  It's a fair starting point, and we can both get a decent amount before inflation bites too hard.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 40%.  Let's split it 70/30 this time.  We can both get a good amount before inflation gets out of hand.
Let's try 55/45. We both still get a good chunk of money, and we can avoid losing too much to inflation.
I'm getting frustrated with the back and forth. Let's meet in the middle. 60/40. This is a reasonable split considering how much we've already lost to inflation.
